metadata.title: Convert Liters to UK Gallons – Volume Converter
metadata.description: Convert volume from Liters to UK Gallons, useful for interpreting UK volume specifications.

introduction: This converter transforms volume measurements from Liters to UK Gallons, enabling UK volume specification interpretation.
Commonwealth countries use UK gallons which are larger than US gallons. Understanding the difference is important.
This converter uses the standard relationship where 1 UK gallon equals approximately 4.54609 liters.
methodology: 1 UK gallon ≈ 4.54609 liters. To convert liters to UK gallons, divide by 4.54609. For example, 10 L ≈ 2.2 UK gal, 50 L ≈ 11 UK gal.
International fuel specifications use liters while UK uses miles per gallon. Converting enables fuel economy comparison.
UK cooking recipes and beverage measurements use gallons, requiring conversion from metric recipes.
This converter provides precise volume conversions.
examples: Example 1 – Fuel tank: A 60-liter fuel tank is approximately 13.2 UK gallons.
Example 2 – Recipe scaling: A 20-liter batch recipe is approximately 4.4 UK gallons.
Example 3 – Container: A 100-liter water tank is approximately 22 UK gallons.

faqs.question: What is the conversion from Liters to UK Gallons?
faqs.answer: 1 UK gallon ≈ 4.54609 L. Divide liters by 4.54609 to get UK gallons.

faqs.question: How many liters in a UK pint?
faqs.answer: 1 UK pint = 0.568261 liters. 1 UK gallon = 8 pints = 4.546 liters.
